item.title: Report X-2024121019
item.description:
Report X-2024121019

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-26T21:13:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-17
  • City: SPRINGFIELD
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO AN AIR PACKAGE THAT WAS COLD TO THE TOUCH. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED APPROXIMATELY ONE POUND OF DRY ICE COOLING MOTHERS MILK. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO. THIS PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED FROM OREGON USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 5VX255, THE UPS STORE, 1863 PIONEER PKWY E, SPRINGFIELD OR 97477-39007.

item.title: Report X-2024121094
item.description:
Report X-2024121094

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-26T21:13:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-16
  • City: EUGENE
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: ONE AIR PACKAGE SHIPPED IN A USPS PRIORITY MAIL BAG WAS INSPECTED DUE TO THE DESCRIPTION ON THE UPS THERMAL LABEL STATING "DUSTUN DUSTERS 10OZ - 2 PACK". ADDITIONALLY, THE GRAVITY AND FEEL OF THE CONTENTS WERE SUSPECTED TO BE AEROSOL. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED TWO FLAMMABLE AEROSOL CANS OF DUST-OFF ELECTRONICS DUSTER, 10 OZ EACH. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER PACKAGING. THIS PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED FROM DELAWARE USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 681EY2, AMAZON.COM.KYDC, INC, 975 POWDER PLANT RD, BESSEMER AL 35022-5497.

item.title: Report X-2024120926
item.description:
Report X-2024120926

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-26T21:13:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-27
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER WENT TO CALL TO FIND SOILED BOX IN UNLOAD. AFTER RETURNING TO PSC FOR FURTHER PROCESSING, RESPONDER DISCOVERED AEROSOL CANS. PACKAGE WAS AN UNDECLARED HAZMAT. RMP TOOK PHOTOS AND WILL REPORT TO HMSC. ENTERING INTO ETT AS UNDECLARED. DAMAGE INSPECTION; LEAKER
